pySTEPS example gallery

Below is a collection of example scripts and tutorials to illustrate the usage of pysteps.

These scripts require the pySTEPS example data. See the installation instructions in the example_data section.

Download all examples in Python source code: example_gallery_python.zip

Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: example_gallery_jupyter.zip
